General.Name: Soktas Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Söktas Tekstil Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the textile and dairy businesses. The company produces and sells raw and finished fabrics. It is also involved in the dairy cow breeding, milk production, and raw milk sales activities. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Aydin, Turkey.
